Summon six fireballs that hover before you. Charge to increase their damage, then release to fire them forward in a curving path that converges after a distance, striking enemies with focused burning power.

items.runes.crosscut.name: Crosscut
items.runes.crosscut.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Bow</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Crosscut</color> Rune Attack.

Spin through your target with a sweeping strike, reverse the motion for a second cut, then somersault back and fire a parting arrow.

items.runes.crush.name: Crush
items.runes.crush.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>One-Handed Weapon</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Crush</color> Rune Attack.

Swing your weapon overhead in a forceful spin and deliver a ground-shaking slam, dealing area of effect damage to all surrounding enemies.

items.runes.crushingDash.name: Crushing Slam
items.runes.crushingDash.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Two-Handed Weapon</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Crushing Slam</color> Rune Attack.

Leap forward and bring your weapon down with monumental force, slamming into the ground to crush enemies beneath its impact.

items.runes.crushingDodge.name: Berserk Slam
items.runes.crushingDodge.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Two-Handed Weapon</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Berserk Slam</color> Rune Attack.

Bellow a battle cry and step forward to slam your weapon into the ground, unleashing a devastating impact that rattles nearby foes.

items.runes.crushingFlurry.name: Crushing Flurry
items.runes.crushingFlurry.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>One-Handed Weapon</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Crushing Flurry</color> Rune Attack.

Wield your weapon with relentless force, delivering seven consecutive crushing swings that batter any foe with each powerful hit.

items.runes.crushingQuad.name: Crushing Quad
items.runes.crushingQuad.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Two-Handed Weapon</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Crushing Quad</color> Rune Attack.

Unleash a wild barrage of swings with your weapon, executing a rapid four-hit combo that devastates foes with each successive strike.

items.runes.crushingTriple.name: Crushing Triple
items.runes.crushingTriple.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Two-Handed Weapon</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Crushing Triple</color> Rune Attack.

Launch into a powerful three-hit combo, each swing heavier and more forceful than the last, to overpower enemies with crushing force.

items.runes.crushingUppercut.name: Crushing Uppercut
items.runes.crushingUppercut.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Two-Handed Weapon</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Crushing Uppercut</color> Rune Attack.

Twirl into a spin that gathers momentum and then unleash a devastating uppercut swing, propelling enemies upward with crushing force.

items.runes.curse.name: Curse
items.runes.curse.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Staff</color> or a <color=#F2E6BD>Wand</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Curse</color> Rune Attack.

Emit a plague beam, infecting all foes in its path. Active until releasing the Rune button.

items.runes.cycloneKick.name: Cyclone Kick
items.runes.cycloneKick.description:
Slot this Rune into <color=#F2E6BD>Gauntlets</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Cyclone Kick</color> Rune Attack.

Leap into the air and spin in a wide arc, delivering a sweeping kick that hits all nearby enemies.

items.runes.cycloneSwipe.name: Cyclone Swipe
items.runes.cycloneSwipe.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Two-Handed Weapon</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Cyclone Swipe</color> Rune Attack.

Swipe your weapon in a circular motion to deal great damage to surrounding enemies.

items.runes.damage.name: Damage Surge
items.runes.damage.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Utility Slot</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Damage Surge</color> Spell.

Temporarily boost your Attack, unleashing a surge of strength that increases your damage output for 120s.

items.runes.dashingStab.name: Dashing Stab
items.runes.dashingStab.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Double Dagger</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Dashing Stab</color> Rune Attack.

Stab your opponent with a powerful, piercing series of attacks.

items.runes.deflect.name: Deflect
items.runes.deflect.description: Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Utility Slot</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Deflect</color> Spell.

items.runes.dodgeSlamdown.name: Dodge Slamdown
items.runes.dodgeSlamdown.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Two-Handed Weapon</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Dodge Slamdown</color> Rune Attack.

Bounce forward and land a powerful strike from above.

items.runes.doubleCrush.name: Double Crush
items.runes.doubleCrush.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Two-Handed Weapon</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Double Crush</color> Rune Attack.

Bounce forward and land two powerful consecutive strikes.

items.runes.doubleSpin.name: Double Spin
items.runes.doubleSpin.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>One-Handed Weapon</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Double Spin</color> Rune Attack.

Execute a rapid spinning attack, striking enemies twice with each rotation.

items.runes.doubleTake.name: Double Take
items.runes.doubleTake.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Double Dagger</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Double Take</color> Rune Attack.

Execute a lightning-fast double strike with your daggers, catching foes off guard with a swift and deadly assault.

items.runes.dragonflyKick.name: Dragonfly Kick
items.runes.dragonflyKick.description:
Slot this Rune into <color=#F2E6BD>Gauntlets</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Dragonfly Kick</color> Technique.

Ascend in a spinning arc and dive down foot-first, striking with precision and flair.

items.runes.driveBreak.name: Drive Break
items.runes.driveBreak.description:
Slot this Rune into <color=#F2E6BD>Gauntlets</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Drive Break</color> Rune Attack.

Charge forward and deliver a crushing punch with unstoppable force, staggering everything in your path.

items.runes.droneTrap.name: Drone Trap
items.runes.droneTrap.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Weapon</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Drone Trap</color> Technique.

Deploy a drone that homes in on your target and explodes on impact, leaving behind a trap. If enemies approach, the trap detonates with a second blast.

items.runes.dropkick.name: Dropkick
items.runes.dropkick.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Weapon</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Dropkick</color> Technique.

Launch yourself feet-first toward your enemy with a brutal dropkick, knocking them back with raw, physical force.

items.runes.dualBreaker.name: Dual Breaker
items.runes.dualBreaker.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Double Dagger</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Dual Breaker</color> Rune Attack.

Strike with both daggers in a devastating cross slash, breaking through enemy defenses with sheer force.

items.runes.dualFlurry.name: Dual Flurry
items.runes.dualFlurry.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Double Dagger</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Dual Flurry</color> Rune Attack.

Unleash a barrage of daggers strikes, overwhelming your enemies with rapid, relentless piercing attacks.

items.runes.dualSlash.name: Dual Slash
items.runes.dualSlash.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Double Dagger</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Dual Slash</color> Rune Attack.

Strike from above, deeply cleaving your opponent with your daggers.

items.runes.eagleEye.name: Eagle Eye
items.runes.eagleEye.description: Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Utility Slot</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Eagle Eye</color> Spell.

items.runes.electricAffliction.name: Electric Affliction
items.runes.electricAffliction.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Utility Slot</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Electric Affliction</color> Spell.

Jolt enemies with unstable currents, increasing the lightning damage and shock buildup they receive for a short duration.

items.runes.electricEnchantment.name: Electric Enchantment
items.runes.electricEnchantment.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Utility Slot</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Electric Enchantment</color> Spell.

Charge your weapon with electric power, electrifying each strike to shock and stun your adversaries.

items.runes.electricResistance.name: Electric Resistance
items.runes.electricResistance.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Utility Slot</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Electric Resistance</color> Spell.

Enhance your defenses against lightning-bases attacks, reducing lightning damage and preventing shock status.

items.runes.eruption.name: Eruption
items.runes.eruption.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Two-Handed Weapon</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Eruption</color> Rune Attack.

Jump and land with a ground-shaking slam to trigger volcanic eruption, damaging all surrounding enemies in a large radius around you.

items.runes.evade.name: Evade
items.runes.evade.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Weapon</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Evade</color> Technique.

Swiftly evade attacks, leaving behind a trail of elemental energy that disorients and weakens enemies.

items.runes.evadeJump.name: Evade Jump
items.runes.evadeJump.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Weapon</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Evade Jump</color> Technique.

Swiftly evade attacks, leaving behind a trail of elemental energy that disorients and weakens enemies.

items.runes.evasivePierce.name: Evasive Pierce
items.runes.evasivePierce.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>One-Handed Weapon</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Evasive Pierce</color> Rune Attack.

Swiftly strike your enemy and retreat.

items.runes.evasiveShot.name: Evasive Shot
items.runes.evasiveShot.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Bow</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Evasive Shot</color> Rune Attack.

Leap back with agile grace, notching and loosing an arrow in one fluid motion to create distance and deal damage simultaneously.

items.runes.evasiveStrike.name: Evasive Strike
items.runes.evasiveStrike.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>One-Handed Weapon</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Evasive Strike</color> Rune Attack.

Take a right step and execute a rapid strike.

items.runes.evasiveSwing.name: Evasive Swing
items.runes.evasiveSwing.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>One-Handed Weapon</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Evasive Swing</color> Rune Attack.

Swing your weapon in an evasive arc, stepping to the left while dealing damage.

items.runes.fierceDash.name: Fierce Dash
items.runes.fierceDash.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>One-Handed Weapon</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Fierce Dash</color> Rune Attack.

Throw yourself forward with ferocious speed, delivering a single stabbing blow that throws enemies back.

items.runes.fireArrow.name: Fire Arrow
items.runes.fireArrow.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Bow</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Fire Arrow</color> Rune Attack.

Ignite your bowstring, transforming your next shot into a blazing arrow to scorch your targets.

items.runes.fireBlast.name: Fire Blast
items.runes.fireBlast.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Wand</color> or a <color=#F2E6BD>Staff</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Fire Blast</color> Rune Attack.

Summon a small explosion of fire in front of you, scorching enemies with intense heat.

items.runes.fireBurst.name: Fire Burst
items.runes.fireBurst.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Wand</color> or a <color=#F2E6BD>Staff</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Fire Burst</color> Rune Attack.

Release a fiery burst that lingers briefly before exploding in a powerful blast of flame.

items.runes.fireDart.name: Fire Dart
items.runes.fireDart.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Wand</color> or a <color=#F2E6BD>Staff</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Fire Dart</color> Rune Attack.

Hurl a searing dart of flame toward your enemy, igniting them with a focused burst of fire.

items.runes.fireDash.name: Fire Dash
items.runes.fireDash.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>One-Handed Weapon</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Fire Dash</color> Rune Attack.

Dash toward your foes with a weapon, engulfed in flames, to land a scorching strike that ignites on impact.

items.runes.fireFlurry.name: Fire Flurry
items.runes.fireFlurry.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>One-Handed Weapon</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Fire Flurry</color> Rune Attack.

Unleash a rapid flurry of fiery strikes, engulfing foes in flames and leaving them scorched.

items.runes.fireNova.name: Fire Nova
items.runes.fireNova.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Staff</color> or a <color=#F2E6BD>Wand</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Fire Nova</color> Rune Attack.

Unleash a fiery explosion around you, damaging all nearby enemies. Charge it to expand the area of effect and increase its attack power.

items.runes.fireSlam.name: Fire Slam
items.runes.fireSlam.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Two-Handed Weapon</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Fire Slam</color> Rune Attack.

Jump and land with a devastating slam to set the area on fire, damaging all surrounding enemies in a small radius around you.

items.runes.fireSwipe.name: Fire Swipe
items.runes.fireSwipe.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Two-Handed Weapon</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Fire Swipe</color> Rune Attack.

Infuse your weapon with flames and unleash a sweeping strike, engulfing enemies in flames.

items.runes.fireThrow.name: Fire Throw
items.runes.fireThrow.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>One-Handed Weapon</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Fire Throw</color> Rune Attack.

Imbue your weapon with fire and hurl it, smashing through enemies in its path and igniting them before returning to your hand.

items.runes.fireWalk.name: Fire Walk
items.runes.fireWalk.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Wand</color> or a <color=#F2E6BD>Staff</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Fire Walk</color> Rune Attack.

Engulf yourself in flames, then leave a trail of fire behind that burns all who follow.

items.runes.fireWall.name: Fire Wall
items.runes.fireWall.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Wand</color> or a <color=#F2E6BD>Staff</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Fire Wall</color> Rune Attack.

Erect a blazing wall of fire in front of you. Enemies that pass through suffer continuous burning damage.

items.runes.fireWave.name: Fire Wave
items.runes.fireWave.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Staff</color> or a <color=#F2E6BD>Wand</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Fire Wave</color> Rune Attack.

Launch a wave of fireballs to blaze multiple foes. Charge it to amplify their damage.

items.runes.fireWhirl.name: Fire Whirl
items.runes.fireWhirl.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>One-Handed Weapon</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Fire Whirl</color> Rune Attack.

Spin in a prolonged fiery whirlwind, engulfing enemies with flames and leaving them burned.

items.runes.fireWhirlwind.name: Fire Whirlwind
items.runes.fireWhirlwind.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Two-Handed Weapon</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Fire Whirlwind</color> Rune Attack.

Spin in a prolonged fiery whirlwind, engulfing enemies with flames and leaving them burned.

items.runes.fireball.name: Fireball
items.runes.fireball.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Staff</color> or a <color=#F2E6BD>Wand</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Fireball</color> Rune Attack.

Cast a blazing fireball that incinerates enemies on impact. Charge it to increase its fiery power and deal more damage.

items.runes.firefall.name: Firefall
items.runes.firefall.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Bow</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Firefall</color> Rune Attack.

Leap upward and plunge an arrow into the earth, erupting a roaring blast of flame that engulfs all caught nearby.

items.runes.flameSweep.name: Flame Sweep
items.runes.flameSweep.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Staff</color> or a <color=#F2E6BD>Wand</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Flame Sweep</color> Rune Attack.

Perform a 360-degree flaming sweep with your staff to break enemy guards and set them ablaze.

items.runes.flipkickBurst.name: Flipkick Burst
items.runes.flipkickBurst.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Bow</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Flipkick Burst</color> Rune Attack.

Launch an upward kick to propel yourself into a tight backflip, loosing three rapid arrows mid-rotation to strike your foe as you slip out of reach.

items.runes.focus.name: Focus Halo
items.runes.focus.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Utility Slot</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Focus Halo</color> Spell.

Elevate your Focus, enhancing your Cerim abilities by increasing your maximum focus points for 120s.

items.runes.frenziedCleave.name: Frenzied Cleave
items.runes.frenziedCleave.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Two-Handed Weapon</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Frenzied Cleave</color> Rune Attack.

Unleash three rapid, savage swings in quick succession, overwhelming enemies with wild, relentless force.

items.runes.frigidArc.name: Frigid Arc
items.runes.frigidArc.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Wand</color> or a <color=#F2E6BD>Staff</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Frigid Arc</color> Rune Attack.

Leap into the air and release a sweeping arc of frost energy, freezing enemies caught in its icy beam from above.

items.runes.frontflipKick.name: Frontflip Kick
items.runes.frontflipKick.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Weapon</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Frontflip Kick</color> Technique.

Perform a forward somersault and smash your foot down on the enemy, delivering a powerful, crushing blow.

items.runes.frostBlade.name: Frost Blade
items.runes.frostBlade.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Wand</color> or a <color=#F2E6BD>Staff</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Frost Blade</color> Rune Attack.

Manifest a massive frozen blade and spin wildly, striking nearby enemies with chilling force.

items.runes.frostDash.name: Frost Dash
items.runes.frostDash.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>One-Handed Weapon</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Frost Dash</color> Rune Attack.

Dash toward your foes with a weapon, cloaked in frost, to land a chilling strike that freezes them in place.

items.runes.frostNeedles.name: Frost Needles
items.runes.frostNeedles.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Wand</color> or a <color=#F2E6BD>Staff</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Frost Needles</color> Rune Attack.

Unleash a fan of sharp ice shards that pierce and slow your enemies.

items.runes.frostNova.name: Frost Nova
items.runes.frostNova.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Staff</color> or a <color=#F2E6BD>Wand</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Frost Nova</color> Rune Attack.

Unleash a burst of icy energy around you, freezing all nearby enemies. Charge it to expand the area of effect and increase its attack power.

items.runes.frostStep.name: Frost Step
items.runes.frostStep.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Wand</color> or a <color=#F2E6BD>Staff</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Frost Step</color> Rune Attack.

Dodge out of harm’s way, then counter with a chilling stream of frost that freezes enemies in your path.

items.runes.frostStream.name: Frost Stream
items.runes.frostStream.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Staff</color> or a <color=#F2E6BD>Wand</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Frost Stream</color> Rune Attack.

Unleash a frost stream, chilling all foes in its path. Active until releasing the Rune button.

items.runes.frostStrike.name: Frost Strike
items.runes.frostStrike.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>One-Handed Weapon</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Frost Strike</color> Rune Attack.

Imbue your weapon with frost power, delivering a chilling strike that freezes foes in their tracks.

items.runes.glacialSpike.name: Glacial Spike
items.runes.glacialSpike.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Staff</color> or a <color=#F2E6BD>Wand</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Glacial Spike</color> Rune Attack.

Target an area, leap into the air, and slam down to create a frosty eruption that damages and freezes all enemies within a large radius.

items.runes.glideburst.name: Glideburst
items.runes.glideburst.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Bow</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Glideburst</color> Rune Attack.

Glide forward in a low, controlled slide, loosing three rapid arrows mid-motion to pressure and punish foes in your path.

items.runes.groundSlam.name: Ground Slam
items.runes.groundSlam.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Two-Handed Weapon</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Ground Slam</color> Rune Attack.

Perform a horizontal sweeping blow and finish the combo with an aerial downward slam.

items.runes.gyroSlash.name: Gyro Slash
items.runes.gyroSlash.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>One-Handed Weapon</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Gyro Slash</color> Rune Attack.

Spin forward in a tight, high-speed rotation, turning your weapon into a whirling disc that slices through anything in your path.

items.runes.hail.name: Hail
items.runes.hail.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Staff</color> or a <color=#F2E6BD>Wand</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Hail</color> Rune Attack.

Launch a wave of icebolts to freeze multiple foes. Charge it to amplify their damage.

items.runes.heal.name: Heal
items.runes.heal.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Utility Slot</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Heal</color> Spell.

Spend focus to restore your health, calling on inner power to recover from wounds.

items.runes.healAura.name: Heal Aura
items.runes.healAura.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Utility Slot</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Heal Aura</color> Spell.

Charge this spell to convert focus into health, surrounding yourself with a restorative aura that heals you over time.

items.runes.health.name: Pulse of Health
items.runes.health.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Utility Slot</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Pulse of Health</color> Spell.

Restore your Health and increase your maximum health for 120s, ensuring you can withstand more damage in battle.

items.runes.heatAffliction.name: Heat Affliction
items.runes.heatAffliction.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Utility Slot</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Heat Affliction</color> Spell.

Afflict enemies with smoldering heat, increasing the fire damage and fire buildup they receive for a short duration.

items.runes.heatEnchantment.name: Heat Enchantment
items.runes.heatEnchantment.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Utility Slot</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Heat Enchantment</color> Spell.

Imbue your weapon with fiery energy, igniting your strikes to scorch enemies and set the battlefield ablaze.

items.runes.heatResistance.name: Heat Resistance
items.runes.heatResistance.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Utility Slot</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Heat Resistance</color> Spell.

Gain resistance to heat-based attacks, reducing fire damage and improving your survival against fiery blows.

items.runes.hellfire.name: Hellfire
items.runes.hellfire.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Staff</color> or a <color=#F2E6BD>Wand</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Hellfire</color> Rune Attack.

Target an area, leap into the air, and slam down to create a fiery eruption that damages all enemies within a large radius.

items.runes.homingFrost.name: Homing Frost
items.runes.homingFrost.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Staff</color> or a <color=#F2E6BD>Wand</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Homing Frost</color> Rune Attack.

Summon a ring of icy darts around you. Upon release, the shards home in on your current target, striking them with freezing force.

items.runes.iceArrow.name: Ice Arrow
items.runes.iceArrow.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Bow</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Ice Arrow</color> Rune Attack.

Enchant your arrow with frost, striking your target with a shard that chills to the core.

items.runes.iceDart.name: Ice Dart
items.runes.iceDart.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Wand</color> or a <color=#F2E6BD>Staff</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Ice Dart</color> Rune Attack.

Fire a chilling dart of ice at your enemy, briefly slowing them with frostbite.

items.runes.iceSweep.name: Ice Sweep
items.runes.iceSweep.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Staff</color> or a <color=#F2E6BD>Wand</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Ice Sweep</color> Rune Attack.

Perform a 360-degree sweep with your staff, encased in ice, breaking enemy guards and freezing them solid.

items.runes.iceThrow.name: Ice Throw
items.runes.iceThrow.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>One-Handed Weapon</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Ice Throw</color> Rune Attack.

Imbue your weapon with ice and hurl it, smashing through enemies in its path and freezing them before returning to your hand.

items.runes.iceWhirl.name: Ice Whirl
items.runes.iceWhirl.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>One-Handed Weapon</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Ice Whirl</color> Rune Attack.

Spin in a prolonged icy whirlwind, freezing and slowing down enemies.

items.runes.icebolt.name: Icebolt
items.runes.icebolt.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Staff</color> or a <color=#F2E6BD>Wand</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Icebolt</color> Rune Attack.

Cast a chilling iceball that freezes enemies on impact. Charge it to increase its freezing power and deal more damage.

items.runes.illuminate.name: Illuminate
items.runes.illuminate.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Utility Slot</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Illuminate</color> Spell.

Summon a radiant light that follows you, illuminating dark areas and revealing hidden paths.

items.runes.inferno.name: Inferno
items.runes.inferno.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Staff</color> or a <color=#F2E6BD>Wand</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Inferno</color> Rune Attack.

Fire a continuous beam of fire, igniting all foes in its path. Active until releasing the Rune button.

items.runes.juggleStrike.name: Juggle Strike
items.runes.juggleStrike.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Two-Handed Weapon</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Juggle Strike</color> Rune Attack.

Charge and unleash a devastating swinging uppercut.

items.runes.jumpCut.name: Jump Cut
items.runes.jumpCut.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>One-Handed Weapon</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Jump Cut</color> Rune Attack.

Leap into the air and deliver a downward slashing strike to enemies below.

items.runes.kickSlash.name: Kick Slash
items.runes.kickSlash.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Two-Handed Weapon</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Kick Slash</color> Rune Attack.

Combine a spinning leg kick with a slashing strike at the end, stunning enemies before delivering a damaging blow.

items.runes.knockdownSwirl.name: Knockdown Swirl
items.runes.knockdownSwirl.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Two-Handed Weapon</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Knockdown Swirl</color> Rune Attack.

Gracefully spin your weapon in a devastating whirlwind, smashing and knocking your enemies down with strength, skill and a series of blows.

items.runes.knockoutShot.name: Knockout Shot
items.runes.knockoutShot.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Bow</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Knockout Shot</color> Rune Attack.

A forceful arrow designed to strike with such impact that it can topple foes, leaving them vulnerable on the ground.

items.runes.leap.name: Leap
items.runes.leap.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>One-Handed Weapon</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Leap</color> Rune Attack.

Leap forward with agility and grace, closing the distance to your enemies and crushing them from above.

items.runes.lifeLeech.name: Life Leech
items.runes.lifeLeech.description: Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Utility Slot</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Life Leech</color> Spell.

items.runes.lightningArrow.name: Lightning Arrow
items.runes.lightningArrow.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Bow</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Lightning Arrow</color> Rune Attack.

Charge your arrow with crackling energy, releasing a bolt that seeks your enemy's weaknesses.

items.runes.lightningAssault.name: Lightning Assault
items.runes.lightningAssault.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Two-Handed Weapon</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Lightning Assault</color> Rune Attack.

Infuse your weapon with lightning and instantly approach a foe with a sweeping strike, electrifying and making vulnerable.

items.runes.lightningBarrage.name: Lightning Barrage
items.runes.lightningBarrage.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Wand</color> or a <color=#F2E6BD>Staff</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Lightning Barrage</color> Rune Attack.

Dash into your enemies and deliver a rapid series of electrified strikes.

items.runes.lightningBlast.name: Lightning Blast
items.runes.lightningBlast.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Wand</color> or a <color=#F2E6BD>Staff</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Lightning Blast</color> Rune Attack.

Electrify the ground beneath your enemies, shocking them with a surge of unstable energy.

items.runes.lightningBolt.name: Lightning Bolt
items.runes.lightningBolt.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Wand</color> or a <color=#F2E6BD>Staff</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Lightning Bolt</color> Rune Attack.

Call down a massive bolt of lightning from the sky, striking your target with thunderous force.

items.runes.lightningDart.name: Lightning Dart
items.runes.lightningDart.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Wand</color> or a <color=#F2E6BD>Staff</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Lightning Dart</color> Rune Attack.

Hurl a crackling dart of lightning toward your target, jolting them on impact.

items.runes.lightningDash.name: Lightning Dash
items.runes.lightningDash.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>One-Handed Weapon</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Lightning Dash</color> Rune Attack.

Dash toward your foes with a weapon, covered in lightning, to land a shocking strike that staggers.

items.runes.lightningFlash.name: Lightning Flash
items.runes.lightningFlash.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Wand</color> or a <color=#F2E6BD>Staff</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Lightning Flash</color> Rune Attack.

Fire concentrated lightning bolts forward, stunning enemies struck by their impact.

items.runes.lightningFlurry.name: Lightning Flurry
items.runes.lightningFlurry.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>One-Handed Weapon</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Lightning Flurry</color> Rune Attack.

Unleash a rapid flurry of lightning strikes, shocking and staggering foes with each electrifying blow.

items.runes.lightningLeap.name: Lightning Leap
items.runes.lightningLeap.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Wand</color> or a <color=#F2E6BD>Staff</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Lightning Leap</color> Rune Attack.

Leap high into the air, then plunge downward in a surge of lightning that shocks all enemies below.

items.runes.lightningSlam.name: Lightning Slam
items.runes.lightningSlam.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>One-Handed Weapon</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Lightning Slam</color> Rune Attack.

Leap into the air to evade attacks and bring pain to your opponents.

items.runes.lightningSpin.name: Lightning Spin
items.runes.lightningSpin.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>One-Handed Weapon</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Lightning Spin</color> Rune Attack.

Spin in a whirlwind of lightning, striking all nearby enemies with electrifying force.

items.runes.lightningStorm.name: Lightning Storm
items.runes.lightningStorm.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Wand</color> or a <color=#F2E6BD>Staff</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Lightning Storm</color> Rune Attack.

Summon multiple bolts of lightning that cascade forward in quick succession, striking anything in their path.

items.runes.lightningSweep.name: Lightning Sweep
items.runes.lightningSweep.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Staff</color> or a <color=#F2E6BD>Wand</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Lightning Sweep</color> Rune Attack.

Perform a 360-degree sweep with your staff, charged with electricity, breaking enemy guards and shocking them.

items.runes.lightningThrow.name: Lightning Throw
items.runes.lightningThrow.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>One-Handed Weapon</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Lightning Throw</color> Rune Attack.

Imbue your weapon with lightning and hurl it, smashing through enemies in its path and electrifying them before returning to your hand.

items.runes.lightningWhirl.name: Lightning Whirl
items.runes.lightningWhirl.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>One-Handed Weapon</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Lightning Whirl</color> Rune Attack.

Spin in a prolonged electrical whirlwind, stunning and making enemies vulnerable.

items.runes.limitBreak.name: Limit Break
items.runes.limitBreak.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Two-Handed Weapon</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Limit Break</color> Rune Attack.

Charge and unleash a 4-hit combo of consecutive slashing strikes with a final overwhelming blow.

items.runes.multiSpin.name: Multi Spin
items.runes.multiSpin.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Two-Handed Weapon</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Multi Spin</color> Rune Attack.

Spin slowly six times in a whirlwind powerful attack, striking all nearby enemies with continuous blows.

items.runes.multishot.name: Multi Shot
items.runes.multishot.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Bow</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Multi Shot</color> Rune Attack.

Unleash a rapid volley of arrows, striking several foes in a single, breath-taking display of archery prowess.

items.runes.overrun.name: Overrun
items.runes.overrun.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>One-Handed Weapon</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Overrun</color> Rune Attack.

Strike your enemy with a rapid two-hit combo, then lunge forward with your full body weight to stagger and overwhelm them.

items.runes.pestilence.name: Pestilence
items.runes.pestilence.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Staff</color> or a <color=#F2E6BD>Wand</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Pestilence</color> Rune Attack.

Target an area, leap into the air, and slam down to create a toxic eruption that damages and poisons all enemies within a large radius.

items.runes.pestilentRecoil.name: Pestilent Recoil
items.runes.pestilentRecoil.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Two-Handed Weapon</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Pestilent Recoil</color> Rune Attack.

Strike with two corrupted melee blows, then leap back and unleash a toxic wave of plague energy toward your enemy.

items.runes.piercingCrush.name: Tornado Spin
items.runes.piercingCrush.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Double Dagger</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Tornado Spin</color> Rune Attack.

Spin in a deadly whirlwind that strikes all nearby enemies.

items.runes.piercingDash.name: Piercing Dash
items.runes.piercingDash.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>One-Handed Weapon</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Piercing Dash</color> Rune Attack.

Dash forward with piercing momentum, striking enemies with a focused and forceful blow.

items.runes.piercingDodge.name: Piercing Dodge
items.runes.piercingDodge.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Double Dagger</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Piercing Dodge</color> Rune Attack.

Dodge swiftly to evade incoming attacks, then pierce through your enemy with a precise, deadly strike from your daggers.

items.runes.piercingFlash.name: Lightning Claw
items.runes.piercingFlash.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Double Dagger</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Lightning Claw</color> Rune Attack.

Electrify your daggers and dash forward, delivering two rapid claw strikes to shock your enemies.

items.runes.piercingFlurry.name: Piercing Flurry
items.runes.piercingFlurry.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>One-Handed Weapon</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Piercing Flurry</color> Rune Attack.

Unleash a flurry of piercing strikes, overwhelming enemies with relentless precision.

items.runes.piercingSpin.name: Piercing Spin
items.runes.piercingSpin.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>One-Handed Weapon</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Piercing Spin</color> Rune Attack.

Unleash a piercing double-strike whirlwind.

items.runes.plagueAffliction.name: Plague Affliction
items.runes.plagueAffliction.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Utility Slot</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Plague Affliction</color> Spell.

Infect enemies with virulent decay, increasing the plague damage and poison buildup they receive for a short duration.

items.runes.plagueArrow.name: Plague Arrow
items.runes.plagueArrow.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Bow</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Plague Arrow</color> Rune Attack.

Coat your arrow in virulent toxins, causing disease and decay upon impact.

items.runes.plagueBarrage.name: Plague Barrage
items.runes.plagueBarrage.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Wand</color> or a <color=#F2E6BD>Staff</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Plague Barrage</color> Rune Attack.

Charge forward and unleash a flurry of plague-ridden projectiles at nearby enemies.

items.runes.plagueBreath.name: Plague Breath
items.runes.plagueBreath.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Staff</color> or a <color=#F2E6BD>Wand</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Plague Breath</color> Rune Attack.

Cast a virulent plague ball that infects enemies on impact. Charge it to increase its toxic power and deal more damage.

items.runes.plagueBurst.name: Plague Burst
items.runes.plagueBurst.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Wand</color> or a <color=#F2E6BD>Staff</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Plague Burst</color> Rune Attack.

Fire four charged plague projectiles that erupt on contact, spreading infection.

items.runes.plagueColumn.name: Plague Column
items.runes.plagueColumn.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Wand</color> or a <color=#F2E6BD>Staff</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Plague Column</color> Rune Attack.

Conjure a vertical torrent of plague energy that spits infectious projectiles outward.

items.runes.plagueCrush.name: Plague Crush
items.runes.plagueCrush.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Two-Handed Weapon</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Plague Crush</color> Rune Attack.

Infuse your weapon with virulent toxins and unleash a sweeping strike, causing disease and decay upon impact.

items.runes.plagueDart.name: Plague Dart
items.runes.plagueDart.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Wand</color> or a <color=#F2E6BD>Staff</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Plague Dart</color> Rune Attack.

Launch a diseased dart that infects your target with a slow-acting poison.

items.runes.plagueDash.name: Plague Dash
items.runes.plagueDash.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>One-Handed Weapon</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Plague Dash</color> Rune Attack.

Dash toward your foes with a weapon, covered in plague, to land a toxic strike that weakens and poisons.

items.runes.plagueEnchantment.name: Plague Enchantment
items.runes.plagueEnchantment.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Utility Slot</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Plague Enchantment</color> Spell.

Coat your weapon with a virulent plague, enhancing its strikes to rapidly build up plague damage.

items.runes.plagueExplosion.name: Plague Explosion
items.runes.plagueExplosion.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Wand</color> or a <color=#F2E6BD>Staff</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Plague Explosion</color> Rune Attack.

Detonate festering buboes that poison and corrode everything caught in their vile radius.

items.runes.plagueLaunch.name: Plague Launch
items.runes.plagueLaunch.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Wand</color> or a <color=#F2E6BD>Staff</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Plague Launch</color> Rune Attack.

Leap backward and slam down with a shockwave of plague, infecting all enemies on landing.

items.runes.plagueNova.name: Plague Nova
items.runes.plagueNova.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Staff</color> or a <color=#F2E6BD>Wand</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Plague Nova</color> Rune Attack.

Unleash a burst of plague energy around you, infecting all nearby enemies. Charge it to expand the area of effect and increase its attack power.

items.runes.plagueResistance.name: Plague Resistance
items.runes.plagueResistance.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Utility Slot</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Plague Resistance</color> Spell.

Build up immunity to plague-based attacks, reducing toxin damage and mitigating poison effects.

items.runes.plagueRetch.name: Plague Retch
items.runes.plagueRetch.description:
Slot this Rune into <color=#F2E6BD>Gauntlets</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Plague Retch</color> Rune Attack.

Evade backward in a smooth arc, then fire a plague-infused blast to punish your foe from range.

items.runes.plagueSmite.name: Plague Smite
items.runes.plagueSmite.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Wand</color> or a <color=#F2E6BD>Staff</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Plague Smite</color> Rune Attack.

Inflict disease beneath your foes, bursting pestilence from underfoot.

items.runes.plagueSplatter.name: Plague Splatter
items.runes.plagueSplatter.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Wand</color> or a <color=#F2E6BD>Staff</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Plague Splatter</color> Rune Attack.

Summon a massive plague bubble and hurl it at your enemies, bursting on impact in a pool of corruption.

items.runes.plagueStrike.name: Plague Strike
items.runes.plagueStrike.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>One-Handed Weapon</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Plague Strike</color> Rune Attack.

Imbue your weapon with plague power, delivering a infectious strike that poisons foes.

items.runes.plagueSweep.name: Plague Sweep
items.runes.plagueSweep.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Staff</color> or a <color=#F2E6BD>Wand</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Plague Sweep</color> Rune Attack.

Perform a 360-degree sweep with your staff, laced with toxins, breaking enemy guards and poisoning them.

items.runes.plagueSwirl.name: Plague Swirl
items.runes.plagueSwirl.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>One-Handed Weapon</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Plague Swirl</color> Rune Attack.

Unleash a swirling vortex of virulent energy, infecting nearby enemies with a debilitating plague.

items.runes.plagueThrow.name: Plague Throw
items.runes.plagueThrow.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>One-Handed Weapon</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Plague Throw</color> Rune Attack.

Imbue your weapon with plague and hurl it, smashing through enemies in its path and infecting them before returning to your hand.

items.runes.plagueWave.name: Plague Wave
items.runes.plagueWave.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Staff</color> or a <color=#F2E6BD>Wand</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Plague Wave</color> Rune Attack.

Launch a wave of virulent curses to plague multiple enemies. Charge it to amplify their damage.

items.runes.plagueWhirl.name: Plague Whirl
items.runes.plagueWhirl.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>One-Handed Weapon</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Plague Whirl</color> Rune Attack.

Spin in a prolonged toxic whirlwind, poisoning enemies to decay.

items.runes.poiseDefense.name: Poise Shield
items.runes.poiseDefense.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Utility Slot</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Poise Shield</color> Spell.

Bolster your Poise, increasing your stability and resistance to being staggered by enemy attacks for 120s.

items.runes.poleDodge.name: Ice Ram
items.runes.poleDodge.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Two-Handed Weapon</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Ice Ram</color> Rune Attack.

Infuse your weapon with frost and unleash a sweeping strike, freezing and slowing enemies down.

items.runes.poleFlurry.name: Pole Flurry
items.runes.poleFlurry.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Two-Handed Weapon</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Pole Flurry</color> Rune Attack.

Perform two vertical sweeping blows and finish the combo with a downward slam.

items.runes.ragingSpiral.name: Raging Spiral
items.runes.ragingSpiral.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Two-Handed Weapon</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Raging Spiral</color> Rune Attack.

Spin forward three times with unstoppable momentum, swinging your weapon in wide arcs to shred all enemies in your path.

items.runes.reap.name: Reap
items.runes.reap.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Two-Handed Weapon</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Reap</color> Rune Attack.

Land two spinning blows on your foe and finish him with a slam strike.

items.runes.recoilStrike.name: Recoil Strike
items.runes.recoilStrike.description:
Slot this Rune into <color=#F2E6BD>Gauntlets</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Recoil Strike</color> Rune Attack.

Dash back to avoid danger, then rebound with a lunging uppercut that launches enemies into the air.

items.runes.regurgitate.name: Regurgitate
items.runes.regurgitate.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Weapon</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Regurgitate</color> Technique.

Vomit a stream of toxic bile at your enemy, dousing them in filth and corruption.

items.runes.rejuvenate.name: Rejuvenate
items.runes.rejuvenate.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Utility Slot</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Rejuvenate</color> Spell.

Channels a mystical energy, allowing you to restore fallen foes back to strength.

items.runes.relentlessCleave.name: Relentless Cleave
items.runes.relentlessCleave.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Two-Handed Weapon</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Relentless Cleave</color> Rune Attack.

Unleash three brutal swings in rapid succession, then smash your weapon into the ground with overwhelming force to trigger a fiery explosion that devastates nearby enemies.

items.runes.repair.name: Repair
items.runes.repair.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Utility Slot</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Repair</color> Spell.

Channel sacred energy to repair and restore durability to your equipped items, ensuring they remain battle-ready.

items.runes.retreatingTrimshot.name: Retreating Trimshot
items.runes.retreatingTrimshot.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Bow</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Retreating Trimshot</color> Rune Attack.

Execute a swift backward somersault while loosing three arrows in rapid succession, maintaining pressure even as you evade danger.

items.runes.return.name: Return
items.runes.return.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Utility Slot</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Return</color> Spell.

Fast Travel to any unlocked whisper of your choice.

items.runes.ripAndTear.name: Rip and Tear
items.runes.ripAndTear.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Two-Handed Weapon</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Rip and Tear</color> Rune Attack.

Slash forward with brutal force, aiming to inflict massive damage and tear through anything standing in your path.

items.runes.risingFang.name: Rising Fang
items.runes.risingFang.description:
Slot this Rune into <color=#F2E6BD>Gauntlets</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Rising Fang</color> Rune Attack.

Launch into the air with a blazing uppercut, striking enemies with upward momentum and sending them flying.

items.runes.rotwheel.name: Rotwheel
items.runes.rotwheel.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Staff</color> or a <color=#F2E6BD>Wand</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Rotwheel</color> Rune Attack.

Summon a massive, rolling mass of plague that barrels forward, infecting and corrupting all enemies in its path.

items.runes.scream.name: Scream
items.runes.scream.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Utility Slot</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Scream</color> Spell.

Let out a powerful scream that knocks down enemies in front of you, leaving them vulnerable to follow-up attacks.

items.runes.seismicCrush.name: Seismic Crush
items.runes.seismicCrush.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Two-Handed Weapon</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Seismic Crush</color> Rune Attack.

Smash your weapon into the ground with unstoppable force, unleashing a massive shockwave that knocks down all nearby enemies.

items.runes.shockNova.name: Shock Nova
items.runes.shockNova.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Staff</color> or a <color=#F2E6BD>Wand</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Shock Nova</color> Rune Attack.

Unleash a burst of electric energy around you, shocking all nearby enemies. Charge it to expand the area of effect and increase its attack power.

items.runes.shockStrike.name: Shock Strike
items.runes.shockStrike.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>One-Handed Weapon</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Shock Strike</color> Rune Attack.

Charge your weapon with crackling electricity and stun foes by delivering a shocking strike while jumping back from them.

items.runes.skybreaker.name: Skybreaker
items.runes.skybreaker.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Bow</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Skybreaker</color> Rune Attack.

Leap skyward and drive an arrow straight down, calling a crackling bolt of lightning to erupt on impact and jolt multiple foes at once.

items.runes.skyburstVolley.name: Skyburst Volley
items.runes.skyburstVolley.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Bow</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Skyburst Volley</color> Rune Attack.

Leap into the air and loose five arrows in a brilliant bursting spread, raining destruction across all caught beneath your descent.

items.runes.skyfallShot.name: Skyfall Shot
items.runes.skyfallShot.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Bow</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Skyfall Shot</color> Rune Attack.

Leap high into the air and drive an arrow straight down, unleashing a violent shockwave on impact that ripples outward from the point of impact.

items.runes.skyfallSmash.name: Skyfall Smash
items.runes.skyfallSmash.description:
Slot this Rune into <color=#F2E6BD>Gauntlets</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Skyfall Smash</color> Rune Attack.

Leap into the air and come crashing down with a devastating punch that creates a shockwave on impact.

items.runes.slamdown.name: Slamdown
items.runes.slamdown.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>One-Handed Weapon</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Slamdown</color> Rune Attack.

Leap into the air and slam down with crushing force, chopping enemies in a radius upon impact.

items.runes.slashingDash.name: Slashing Dash
items.runes.slashingDash.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>One-Handed Weapon</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Slashing Dash</color> Rune Attack.

Dash forward with a heavy slashing strike, cutting through enemies on your way.

items.runes.slashingDodge.name: Slashing Dodge
items.runes.slashingDodge.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>One-Handed Weapon</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Slashing Dodge</color> Rune Attack.

Take a step back to evade attacks and then lunge forward with a dissecting strike.

items.runes.slashingFlurry.name: Slashing Flurry
items.runes.slashingFlurry.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>One-Handed Weapon</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Slashing Flurry</color> Rune Attack.

Unleash a flurry of slashing strikes, shredding enemies with a relentless assault and finishing with a piercing blow.

items.runes.slashingPirouette.name: Slashing Pirouette
items.runes.slashingPirouette.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>One-Handed Weapon</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Slashing Pirouette</color> Rune Attack.

Perform a graceful double-strike pirouette forward.

items.runes.slashingSpin.name: Slashing Spin
items.runes.slashingSpin.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Two-Handed Weapon</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Slashing Spin</color> Rune Attack.

Charge and unleash a devastating swinging blow.

items.runes.slowAura.name: Slow Aura
items.runes.slowAura.description: Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Utility Slot</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Slow Aura</color> Spell.

items.runes.somersault.name: Surge Slash
items.runes.somersault.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>One-Handed Weapon</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Surge Slash</color> Rune Attack.

Charge a powerful spinning strike, unleashing a surge of destructive force.

items.runes.spark.name: Spark
items.runes.spark.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Staff</color> or a <color=#F2E6BD>Wand</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Spark</color> Rune Attack.

Launch a wave of lightning bolts to shock multiple foes. Charge it to amplify their damage.

items.runes.spectre.name: Spectre
items.runes.spectre.description: Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Utility Slot</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Spectre</color> Spell.

items.runes.speed.name: Gale of Speed
items.runes.speed.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Utility Slot</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Gale of Speed</color> Spell.

Harness the power of the wind to increase your movement Speed, allowing you to traverse the battlefield swiftly for 120s.

items.runes.spin.name: Spin
items.runes.spin.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>One-Handed Weapon</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Spin</color> Rune Attack.

Execute a wheel attack, sweeping all enemies on your way.

items.runes.spinCrush.name: Spin Crush
items.runes.spinCrush.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Two-Handed Weapon</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Spin Crush</color> Rune Attack.

Perform a horizontal sweeping blow and finish the combo with a downward strike.

items.runes.spinStrike.name: Spin Strike
items.runes.spinStrike.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Wand</color> or a <color=#F2E6BD>Staff</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Spin Strike</color> Rune Attack.

Spin into a fiery whirlwind, lashing out in all directions and scorching surrounding enemies.

items.runes.spiralCrash.name: Spiral Crash
items.runes.spiralCrash.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Two-Handed Weapon</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Spiral Crash</color> Rune Attack.

Step forward and spin with crushing momentum, then deliver a devastating blow that knocks nearby enemies to the ground.

items.runes.spiritBurst.name: Spirit Burst
items.runes.spiritBurst.description:
Slot this Rune into <color=#F2E6BD>Gauntlets</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Spirit Burst</color> Rune Attack.

Project a focused blast of inner energy from your fists, striking foes at range with pure force.

items.runes.stamina.name: Stamina Wellspring
items.runes.stamina.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Utility Slot</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Stamina Wellspring</color> Spell.

Tap into a wellspring of energy, increasing your Stamina and enabling you to perform more actions for 120s.

items.runes.static.name: Static
items.runes.static.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Wand</color> or a <color=#F2E6BD>Staff</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Static</color> Rune Attack.

Charge your body with static energy, electrocuting enemies who come too close.

items.runes.stormpiercer.name: Stormpiercer
items.runes.stormpiercer.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>One-Handed Weapon</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Stormpiercer</color> Rune Attack.

Lunge forward to strike your enemy with a lightning-charged blow, then unleash projectiles from your weapon to electrify surrounding foes.

items.runes.swipeKick.name: Swipe Kick
items.runes.swipeKick.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Weapon</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Swipe Kick</color> Technique.

Spin into a powerful roundhouse kick, striking enemies with a wide, sweeping arc of force.

items.runes.tauntStrike.name: Taunt Strike
items.runes.tauntStrike.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>One-Handed Weapon</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Taunt Strike</color> Rune Attack.

Taunt enemies to draw their attention towards you and land a sudden blow.

items.runes.tempestKick.name: Tempest Kick
items.runes.tempestKick.description:
Slot this Rune into <color=#F2E6BD>Gauntlets</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Tempest Kick</color> Rune Attack.

Launch into a spinning aerial assault, striking multiple times with a whirlwind of kicks.

items.runes.thorns.name: Thorns
items.runes.thorns.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Utility Slot</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Thorns</color> Spell.

Channel sacred energy to get a mark of protection, reflecting damage back to enemies who strike you.

items.runes.throw.name: Throw
items.runes.throw.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>One-Handed Weapon</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Throw</color> Rune Attack.

Hurl your weapon with tremendous force, smashing through enemies in its path before returning to your hand.

items.runes.throwAxe.name: Throw Axe
items.runes.throwAxe.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Weapon</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Throw Axe</color> Technique.

Hurl a spinning axe toward your enemy, dealing heavy damage on impact.

items.runes.throwKnife.name: Throw Knife
items.runes.throwKnife.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Weapon</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Throw Knife</color> Technique.

Hurl a sharp knife at your enemy with deadly precision.

items.runes.thrust.name: Thrust
items.runes.thrust.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>One-Handed Weapon</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Thrust</color> Rune Attack.

Thrust your weapon forward with a focused strike that knocks your enemy down.

items.runes.thunderstrike.name: Thunderstrike
items.runes.thunderstrike.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Staff</color> or a <color=#F2E6BD>Wand</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Thunderstrike</color> Rune Attack.

Target an area, leap into the air, and slam down to create a thunderous eruption that damages and stuns all enemies within a large radius.

items.runes.tornadoStrike.name: Tornado Strike
items.runes.tornadoStrike.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>One-Handed Weapon</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Tornado Strike</color> Rune Attack.

Spin rapidly around your axis, striking enemies with each rotation in a relentless storm of blows.

items.runes.tremorSlam.name: Tremor Slam
items.runes.tremorSlam.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Two-Handed Weapon</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Tremor Slam</color> Rune Attack.

Smash your weapon into the ground with unstoppable force, unleashing a shockwave that shakes the earth and staggers nearby enemies.

items.runes.tremorWave.name: Tremor Wave
items.runes.tremorWave.description:
Slot this Rune into <color=#F2E6BD>Gauntlets</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Tremor Wave</color> Rune Attack.

Punch the ground with seismic force, unleashing a shockwave that travels forward and hits enemies from below.

items.runes.trinityBarrage.name: Trinity Barrage
items.runes.trinityBarrage.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>One-Handed Weapon</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Trinity Barrage</color> Rune Attack.

Unleash a barrage of three consecutive strikes.

items.runes.tripleSwipe.name: Triple Swipe
items.runes.tripleSwipe.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>One-Handed Weapon</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Triple Swipe</color> Rune Attack.

Overwhelm your foes by dealing three consecutive slashes.

items.runes.turnbackKick.name: Turnback Kick
items.runes.turnbackKick.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Weapon</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Turnback Kick</color> Technique.

Spin around your axis and deliver a powerful backward kick that knocks enemies away.

items.runes.twirlDash.name: Twirl Dash
items.runes.twirlDash.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>One-Handed Weapon</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Twirl Dash</color> Rune Attack.

Dash forward while twirling in a spiral motion, hitting enemies with spinning strikes.

items.runes.twirlSpin.name: Twirl Spin
items.runes.twirlSpin.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>One-Handed Weapon</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Twirl Spin</color> Rune Attack.

Gracefully spin your weapon in a powerful whirlwind, smashing your enemies with dexterity, skill and a series of blows.

items.runes.wallbreaker.name: Wallbreaker
items.runes.wallbreaker.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Two-Handed Weapon</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Wallbreaker</color> Rune Attack.

Pierce through enemy barriers and defenses with a powerful stab, shattering obstacles in your path.

items.runes.whirl.name: Whirl
items.runes.whirl.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>One-Handed Weapon</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Whirl</color> Rune Attack.

Spin rapidly six times in a whirlwind attack, striking all nearby enemies with continuous blows.

items.runes.whirlstepStrike.name: Whirlstep Strike
items.runes.whirlstepStrike.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>One-Handed Weapon</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Whirlstep Strike</color> Rune Attack.

Execute a tempestuous whirl, striking with two furious blows.

items.runes.whirlwind.name: Whirlwind
items.runes.whirlwind.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Two-Handed Weapon</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Whirlwind</color> Rune Attack.

Spin rapidly in a whirlwind attack, striking all nearby enemies with continuous blows.

items.runes.wildRush.name: Wild Rush
items.runes.wildRush.description:
Slot this Rune into a <color=#F2E6BD>Double Dagger</color> to gain the <color=#F2E6BD>Wild Rush</color> Rune Attack.

Charge forward, slashing wildly with your daggers to cut your way through foes.

items.upgradeMaterials.parts.boar.boarHo.name: Boar Hoof
items.upgradeMaterials.parts.boar.boarHo.description: Hairy and putrid. But at least it can be used to <color=#F2E6BD>craft or upgrade gear</color>.

items.upgradeMaterials.parts.boar.boarSk.name: Boar Skull
items.upgradeMaterials.parts.boar.boarSk.description: Intimidatingly large, even in death. This trophy can be used to <color=#F2E6BD>craft or upgrade gear</color>.

items.upgradeMaterials.parts.boar.boarTu.name: Boar Tusk
items.upgradeMaterials.parts.boar.boarTu.description: Elegant but deadly; it can be used to <color=#F2E6BD>craft or upgrade gear</color>.

items.upgradeMaterials.parts.capercailli.name: Capercaillie Foot
items.upgradeMaterials.parts.capercailli.description: Whether good luck or bad, no one knows; but it can be used to <color=#F2E6BD>craft consumables</color>.

items.upgradeMaterials.parts.capercailli.name: Capercaillie Head
items.upgradeMaterials.parts.capercailli.description: These feathered remains can be used to <color=#F2E6BD>craft consumables</color>.

items.upgradeMaterials.parts.capercailli.name: Capercaillie Wing
items.upgradeMaterials.parts.capercailli.description: This vibrant plumage can be used to <color=#F2E6BD>craft consumables</color>.

items.upgradeMaterials.parts.fish.scales.name: Beluga Scales
items.upgradeMaterials.parts.fish.scales.description: Exceedingly rare and beautiful, these can be used to <color=#F2E6BD>craft consumables</color>.

items.upgradeMaterials.parts.goat.goatBl.name: Goat Blood
items.upgradeMaterials.parts.goat.goatBl.description: Often used during Dasha rituals, the effects of goat blood have never been fully understood.

items.upgradeMaterials.parts.humanoids.h.name: Human Bone
items.upgradeMaterials.parts.humanoids.h.description: The remains of those who fall in battle can be used to <color=#F2E6BD>craft or upgrade gear</color>.

items.upgradeMaterials.parts.humanoids.h.name: Human Hand
items.upgradeMaterials.parts.humanoids.h.description: A grotesque trophy that can be used to <color=#F2E6BD>craft or upgrade gear</color>.

items.upgradeMaterials.parts.humanoids.m.name: Malformed Skull
items.upgradeMaterials.parts.humanoids.m.description: A pitiful and disturbing specimen; but it can be used to <color=#F2E6BD>craft or upgrade gear</color>.

items.upgradeMaterials.parts.plaguedBear.name: Bear Heart
items.upgradeMaterials.parts.plaguedBear.description: Can be used to <color=#F2E6BD>craft consumables</color> - provided it has stopped beating.

items.upgradeMaterials.parts.plaguedBear.name: Bear Paw
items.upgradeMaterials.parts.plaguedBear.description: A rare memento, difficult to come by. It can be used to <color=#F2E6BD>craft consumables</color>.

items.upgradeMaterials.parts.plaguedBear.name: Bear Skull
items.upgradeMaterials.parts.plaguedBear.description: Picked clean of flesh, this can be kept as a souvenir or used to <color=#F2E6BD>craft or upgrade gear</color>.

items.upgradeMaterials.parts.siren.siren.name: Siren Claw
items.upgradeMaterials.parts.siren.siren.description: The talon of Sacra's most reviled water dweller. This can be used to <color=#F2E6BD>craft or upgrade gear</color>.

items.upgradeMaterials.parts.siren.siren.name: Siren Skull
items.upgradeMaterials.parts.siren.siren.description: The grimy skull of a creature native to Sacra, but loved by none. It can be used to <color=#F2E6BD>craft or upgrade gear</color>.

items.upgradeMaterials.parts.siren.siren.name: Siren Tail
items.upgradeMaterials.parts.siren.siren.description: Sharp as a whip and slimy as a liver, this can be used to <color=#F2E6BD>craft consumables</color>.

items.upgradeMaterials.parts.stag.stagAn.name: Stag Antlers
items.upgradeMaterials.parts.stag.stagAn.description: A majestic trophy that can be used to <color=#F2E6BD>craft or upgrade gear</color>.

items.upgradeMaterials.parts.stag.stagHo.name: Stag Hoof
items.upgradeMaterials.parts.stag.stagHo.description: The severed foot of a stately beast; it can be used to <color=#F2E6BD>craft or upgrade gear</color>.

items.upgradeMaterials.parts.stag.stagSk.name: Stag Skull
items.upgradeMaterials.parts.stag.stagSk.description: A grinning reminder of nature's beauty. It can be used to <color=#F2E6BD>craft or upgrade gear</color>.

items.upgradeMaterials.parts.turkey.turk.name: Turkey Feet
items.upgradeMaterials.parts.turkey.turk.description: They may be ragged and bony, but these feet can be used to <color=#F2E6BD>craft consumables</color>.

items.upgradeMaterials.parts.turkey.turk.name: Turkey Head
items.upgradeMaterials.parts.turkey.turk.description: Repugnant though it may be, this can be used to <color=#F2E6BD>craft consumables</color>.

items.upgradeMaterials.parts.turkey.turk.name: Turkey Tail
items.upgradeMaterials.parts.turkey.turk.description: This impressive array of feathers can be used to <color=#F2E6BD>craft consumables</color>.

items.upgradeMaterials.parts.wingedBrood.name: Winged Brood Claw
items.upgradeMaterials.parts.wingedBrood.description: A curved talon, created by God for the carving of flesh. It can be used to <color=#F2E6BD>craft or upgrade gear</color>.

items.upgradeMaterials.parts.wingedBrood.name: Winged Brood Skull
items.upgradeMaterials.parts.wingedBrood.description: Although the true origin of these creatures is unknown, their bones can be used to <color=#F2E6BD>craft or upgrade gear</color>.

items.upgradeMaterials.parts.wingedBrood.name: Winged Brood Wing
items.upgradeMaterials.parts.wingedBrood.description: A foul remnant of the threat that lurks in the skies since the Gate was opened. It can be used to <color=#F2E6BD>craft or upgrade gear</color>.

items.upgradeMaterials.parts.wolf.wolfCl.name: Wolf Claw
items.upgradeMaterials.parts.wolf.wolfCl.description: Sleek and deadly, now rendered harmless. It can be used to <color=#F2E6BD>craft or upgrade gear</color>.

items.upgradeMaterials.parts.wolf.wolfKi.name: Wolf Kidney
items.upgradeMaterials.parts.wolf.wolfKi.description: Swollen and rotten; it has a foul smell to it. But at least it can be used to <color=#F2E6BD>craft or upgrade gear</color>.

items.upgradeMaterials.parts.wolf.wolfSk.name: Wolf Skull
items.upgradeMaterials.parts.wolf.wolfSk.description: Lethal in life, useful in death. This skull can be used to <color=#F2E6BD>craft or upgrade gear</color>.

items.upgradeMaterials.plaguedResources..name: Torn Effigy
items.upgradeMaterials.plaguedResources..description: A totem of sinew, husk, and marrow, it pulls like a compass toward flame. But will its burning challenge the plague, or succumb to it?

items.upgradeMaterials.plaguedResources..name: Torn Husk
items.upgradeMaterials.plaguedResources..description:
The carapace of a pestilence-infected being, its foul architecture holds a great and terrible strength.

This remnant can be used to <color=#F2E6BD>upgrade gear</color> or <color=#F2E6BD>craft an Effigy</color>.

items.upgradeMaterials.plaguedResources..name: Torn Marrow
items.upgradeMaterials.plaguedResources..description:
What flows in a Torn creature’s veins if not blood? What nourishes them if not food? Can a being live off rage alone?

This remnant can be used to <color=#F2E6BD>upgrade gear</color> or <color=#F2E6BD>craft an Effigy</color>.

items.upgradeMaterials.plaguedResources..name: Torn Sinew
items.upgradeMaterials.plaguedResources..description:
Like the tangled threads of some demon’s loom, this sinew stitched a plagued monstrosity into being.

This remnant can be used to <color=#F2E6BD>upgrade gear</color> or <color=#F2E6BD>craft an Effigy</color>.
